alert.note: Alert for Ransom; Richland; Sargent (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 03 at 10:11PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of west central Minnesota and southeast North Dakota, including the following areas, in west central Minnesota, East Otter Tail, Grant, West Otter Tail and Wilkin. In southeast North Dakota, Ransom, Richland and Sargent. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Heavy rainfall from storms moving over repeated areas of storms with very heavy rainfall may lead to flooding across the area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
